project.description: Client proxy generation library based on RestEasy 2.3.4.Final

property.name: message
property.value: Illegal import of junit.framework library. Use org.junit instead.

property.name: message

property.name: message
property.value: Old/Legacy import of Apache commons-lang v2 library. Use the commons-lang3 variant if possible, or wrap import in CHECKSTYLE_OFF exclusions if not possible.

property.name: tokens
property.value: BAND, BOR, BSR, BXOR, COLON, DIV, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LE, LITERAL_INSTANCEOF, LOR, LT, MINUS, MOD, NOT_EQUAL, QUESTION, SL, SR, STAR
